ComicInfo.Summary: It seems nothing ever goes right for our Jolly Green Goliath. No sooner does the Hulk return to the Microworld of K'ai and the arms of his beloved Jarella, than he finds himself a captive of the millenia-old madman called Psyklop!

ComicInfo.Title: Assault of Psyklop!
